title: Fight Fascism Fridays
description: Join Indivisible Las Vegas as we gather at the Federal Courthouse to stand against fascism, calling for impeachment, conviction, and removal of those in power. Let's unite for change.

title: Corner Protest
description: We encourage participation in a recurring protest focused on positive civic engagement and political expression each Tuesday and Thursday. Join us to protect democracy and advocate for justice.
address: SW Corner of Drake and College
meeting_location: 2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
raw_text:

Positive engagement

WE THE PEOPLE

Tuesday, Dec 9, 2025

3:15 - 5:15 pm

2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO

title: ACT UP Protest
description: We are gathering to protest and make a difference together. Bring a protest sign or flag; extras are provided if needed. This event occurs every other Saturday to express solidarity.
raw_text:
NOW is the time to ACT UP!
Every other Saturday at the Corner of Harmony Road & Weitzel
10:00-11:00 AM
Bring a protest sign or your flag if you have them. If not, we have extras for you.
Together we can make a difference.

December 13, 2025
10:00-11:00 am
Harmony Rd & Weitzel St
Timnath, CO

Indivisible Timnath

title: Boston ICE Tea Party
description: Join us in celebrating the 252nd anniversary of the Boston Tea Party. We will gather to express dissatisfaction with modern parallels to historic grievances, emphasizing a call to action against current authoritative measures. The evening includes a short march to the Waterfront Plaza after gathering.
meeting_location: Across from the Old South Meeting House. March to Waterfront Plaza.
raw_text:
CALLING ALL PATRIOTS

Join the Boston ICE Tea Party!

No Kings!
No Tariffs!
No ICE!

üìÖ 7:15pm Tue, Dec. 16th, the 252th anniversary of the Boston Tea Party.

üìç 24 School St, Boston, across from the Old South Meeting house. March to Waterfront Plaza.

RSVP + Info
raw_summary: The image is a flyer promoting an event called "Boston ICE Tea Party" on December 16th at 7:15 PM in Boston, Massachusetts. It commemorates the 252nd anniversary of the Boston Tea Party. The event location is 24 School St, across from the Old South Meeting House, concluding with a march to Waterfront Plaza. RSVP and additional information are available via a QR code. The event is organized by Boston Indivisible and another organization indicated by a "MASS 501" logo.
